resources.string: " Welcome to RobuxEarny! An user-friendly application where you can effortlessly earn Robux!\nYou just need to play a very simple scratch card game, It's completely free and you will be able to redeem your robux by accumulating your coins!"

" This app has a special coin system with six packages.
Each package comes with a different amount of coins.
By playing fun scratch cards, you can earn coins.
The more coins you earn, the more packages you can unlock.
This means you'll have more chances to earn Robux! It's a simple way to earn Robux and have fun along the way!"
" When you are ready press the start button below and start right now to earn a lot of Robux!\m In order to send you the Robux don't forget to click on the ads as much as you can.\n"
Please finish your current ticket first.
